Package gov.nih.nci.hl7.validation

All validation related functionality.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractDatatypeValidator Validate if the abstract data type has been specialized.
ChoiceCloneValidator Validate if the choice is made on the choice box options, only validate at clone level, not the child clone level.
CloneMetaValidator Validation for H3S Component.
CoreAttributesHelper Helper class for the Vocabulary Service.
CSVMetaValidator Used to validate CSV metadata (scs files).
IntegerValidator This class defines interger validation
MapLinkValidator This class defines a basic validator to check if two objects are valid to participate in mapping.
MapValidator Used to validate mapping information (map files).
Message A text message which could take parameter
ValidationMessageUtils This class defines common utility methods to facilitate validation related handling.
Validator The base class of validator
ValidatorResult A validation result for an atomic validation event.
ValidatorResults An aggregation of validator result
VocabularyService Perform Vocabulary validations.
XMLValidator Perform XML validations.
 

Enum Summary
ValidatorResult.Level  
 

Exception Summary
ValidationException Exception class of Validation
 

Package gov.nih.nci.hl7.validation Description

All validation related functionality.
